scripts.build:all: npm run build:dva && npm run build:utility
scripts.build:fvp: npm run build:f && npm run build:vp
scripts.clean:all: rimraf ./yarn-error.log && rimraf ./yarn.lock && lerna clean -y && rimraf ./package-lock.json && npm run clean:cli && npm run clean:utility && npm run clean:dva && npm run clean:rollup && rimraf ./node_modules
scripts.czs: git stage -A && npm run cz && git push
scripts.lerna:b: husky install && git pull && pnpm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:all:fix: npm run lint:cli:fix && npm run lint:utility:fix && npm run lint:dva:fix
scripts.ncu:all: ncu && npm run ncu:rollup && npm run ncu:cli && npm run ncu:dva && npm run ncu:utility
scripts.ncu:u:all: ncu -u && npm run ncu:u:rollup && npm run ncu:u:cli && npm run ncu:u:dva && npm run ncu:u:utility
scripts.publish:c: npm run czs && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.publish:f: npm run czs && npm run build:all && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.publish:npm: nrm use npm && npx sleepms 2000 && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-utility-only && npm run publish:npm-dva-only && npm run publish:npm-cli-only && nrm use local && echo sleep 2000ms && npx sleepms 2000 && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-cli: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-cli-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-dva: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-dva-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:npm-utility: nrm use npm && nrm ls && npm run publish:npm-utility-only && nrm use local && nrm ls
scripts.publish:v: npm run build:all && lerna updated && lerna publish --yes
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm run lerna:b
